Hey @abdullahbm09! You shouldn't install Truffle using `sudo`. The best solution I have found is to use/install npm with a version manager like nvm, and this is what npm itself recommends. Check out [this article from npm](https://docs.npmjs.com/resolving-eacces-permissions-errors-when-installing-packages-globally).

Try re-installing npm with nvm and try again. It should resolve these types of issues.
This issue is a duplicate of #2127, we are closing this issue in favor of that one. Thanks for bringing this up @abdullahbm09, we will be working on a fix!
